chapters.title: Chapter 37: The Last Battle
chapters.info: Hammar, p. 707—A Blademaster and Warder who once taught the sword to young men that came to the White Tower. He was killed by Gawyn during the chaos surrounding Siuan Sanche's deposition and imprisonment. He taught Gawyn that it is a Warder's duty to offer challenge where his Aes Sedai's safety is concerned. Gawyn deeply regrets killing him.
